statements: DELETE FROM bank_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'Withdrawal';
DELETE FROM bank_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND amount > 500
DELETE FROM bank_transactions WHERE account_id = 200 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM ReconciliationStatus WHERE statement_id = 2 AND transaction_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE amount < -100 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ReconciliationStatus WHERE is_reconciled = FALSE AND reconciliation_date IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM discrepancies WHERE discrepancy_type = 'Mismatch' AND discrepancy_notes LIKE '%pending%';
DELETE FROM Reconciliation_Log WHERE status = 'pending' AND log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM Reconciliation_Log WHERE statement_id = 2001);
